title: Reporting Toxic Player
body:
He was flaming Caitlyn in this game I was playing and I he added me just to flame me because I called him toxic. I have a video but I am not sure how to add it in.

Link:
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2556172666/237512565?tab=overview


Video Evidence:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w829muh9BUg&feature=youtu.be

replies.body: Since there isn't a way to report someone for that kind of behavior outside of an actual game, it makes it a little hard to submit an actual report. I'd suggest shooting blocking that guy for now, but also send this video over to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if there's anything that can be done.
